feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.6°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
